name: Verify Ladder Requires Suit
description: Validates that the ladder cannot be climbed without first obtaining the suit, enforcing the dependency between these two interactions.
testObjective: Ensure the game properly enforces the suit prerequisite for ladder access.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has NOT obtained the suit

steps.action: Identify the ladder embedded in the wall (without obtaining the suit first)
Approach the ladder and attempt to interact with it
steps.expected: No interaction prompt appears OR interaction is blocked

steps.action: Press [E] to attempt climbing the ladder
steps.expected: Ladder cannot be climbed, player receives feedback that suit is required

steps.action: Obtain the suit from the wall
Return to the ladder and press [E] to interact
steps.expected: Ladder can now be climbed successfully

postconditions: Dependency between suit and ladder is confirmed
Player can only access ladder after obtaining suit
